message: The FDA is aware of the emerging drug shortage and is actively monitoring the situation. We encourage manufacturers to report any production challenges and buyers to manage inventories responsibly. Coordination efforts are underway to ensure supply stabilization.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and disrupted market stability.
